Q_DESC:
Write a program to do the following operations on the queue:
1- to enqueue
2- to dequeue
3- to display front()
4-to display rear()
Implement queue using linked list.

INPUT
First line contains the choice of the user
OUTPUT
The output prints the required action
TESTCASE_1:
1
10
1
20
1
30
1
40
2
3
4
0
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
10 enqueued to queue
20 enqueued to queue
30 enqueued to queue
40 enqueued to queue
10 dequeued from queue
Front item is 20
Rear item is 40

Rear item is 20
